description.en: The coach should know the specific characters of organism and health risks among athletes of different age to avoid injuries and diseases during physical activity and should take into account the health risks of training in extreme environmental conditions. Everyone should knoe how to act in case of accidents and sudden illnesses. Knowledge and skills in first aid give the courage to act and help in different situations.
description.et: Sportlasi treenides peab tundma erinevas vanuste inimeste organismi eripära ja terviseriske, samuti ohte ekstreemsetes keskkonnatingumustes, et vältida tervisekahjustusi sportimisel. Iga inimene peaks teadma, kuidas toimida õnnetusjuhtumite ja äkkhaigestumiste korral. Esmaabi teadmised ja oskused annavad võimaluse tegutseda ning abistada erinevates olukordades.

objectives.en: After finishing the course, the student will know the specific health characters of athletes in different age and health conditions; will take into account the health risks in different environmental conditions and will have theoretical knowledge and practical know-how of basic first aid of accidents and sudden illnesses.
objectives.et: Kursuse läbinud üliõpilane teab erinevas vanuses ja tervislikus seisundis spordiharrastajate organismi ja terviseriskide eripärasid, oskab arvestada terviseriskidega erinevates keskkonnatingimustes ja omandab teoreetilisi ja praktilisi teadmisi õnnestuste ja äkkhaigestumiste esmaabist.

learning_outcomes.en: Knows the importance and principes of health control among athletes;
Knows the specific characters and health risks of physical activity in athletes of different age and medical conditions
learning_outcomes.et: Teab erinevas vanuses ja tervislikus seisundis sportlaste organismi eripärasid ja terviseriske treenimisel

learning_outcomes.en: Takes into account the health risks in extreme environmental conditions
Knows general acting principles in case of accidents and sudden illness
learning_outcomes.et: Teab üldisi tegutsemise põhimõtteid õnnetuste ja äkkhaigestumiste korral

learning_outcomes.en: Is able to render first aid in case of injuries, be able to dress a wound, to stop bleeding and to splint fractures
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab anda esmaabi vigastuste korral, siduda haava, peatada verejooksu ja lahastada luumurdu

learning_outcomes.en: Is able to render first aid in case of freezing and burn damages and intoxication
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab anda esmaabi kuuma- ja külmakahjustuste ning põletuste ja mürgistuste korral

learning_outcomes.en: Is able to render first aid in case of shock and be able to resuscitate
learning_outcomes.et: Oskab anda esmaabi šoki korral ja elustada

independent_work.et: Koostada referaat "Levinumad vigastused minu spordialal ja nende ennetamine"

grade_preconditions.et: Sooritatud test esmaabi kursuse lõpus ja referaadi esitamine.

grade_evaluation.et: Arvestuslikud tööd esitatud + arvestuslik test tervisega seotud aspektide kohta kursuse lõpus.
